title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1812/97 of 19 September 1997 correcting Regulation (EC) No 2931/95 amending Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 and other Regulations following modification of the combined nomenclature for certain milk products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1812/97 of 19 September 1997 correcting Regulation (EC) No 2931/95 amending Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 and other Regulations following modification of the combined nomenclature for certain milk products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 1 (4) of Regulation (EC) No 2931/95 the third indent is replaced by:
'- the entry under CN code ex 1901 90 90 is replaced by:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 September 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 34, 9. 12. 1979, p. 2.
(2) OJ L 312, 27. 10. 1989, p. 5.
(3) OJ L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(4) OJ L 206, 16. 8. 1996, p. 21.
(5) OJ L 259, 30. 10. 1995, p. 1.
(6) OJ L 307, 20. 12. 1995, p. 10.
